TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_trv_Suru, title = Suru, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Seediq]}, url = {https://trv.wikipedia.org/wiki/Suru} }

S.FORM: = Suru = Gaga mniq Myawriseyn Tayansyang ka alang Suru. 95 sapah ka kneegu na sapah, 292 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnpusu seejiq o mangal 96% niqan 279 hiyi sp, rahuq na uxay tnpusu seejiq o mangal 4% niqan 13 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Tayal 94%, Amis 1%, Rukai 0.5%, ni rahuq na o 0.5%. = Pnyahan pnatas =

= Soro = Gaga mniq Myawriseyn Tayansyang ka alang Soro. 95 sapah ka kneego na sapah, 292 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnposo seejiq o mangal 96% niqan 279 hiyi sp, rahoq na oxay tnposo seejiq o mangal 4% niqan 13 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Tayal 94%, Amis 1%, Rokai 0.5%, ni rahoq na o 0.5%. = Pnyahan pnatas =
